sentences.en: " Come on, Carrie ,'she called, but Carrie was reaching farther out.
sentences.cn: “ 快过来, 嘉莉! " 她喊着, 但是嘉莉继续往外走.

sentences.en: A table stood at the farther end of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 厨房的那一头放着一张桌子。

sentences.en: Both of my sisters moved even farther away from home.
sentences.cn: 我的两个姐姐都搬得离家更远了。

sentences.en: Carrie was standing farther back in the room, hearing it all.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉正站在房间里离门远些的地方, 听到了这一切.

sentences.en: He moved his arm farther around her waist and pulled her closer.
sentences.cn: 他把手在她腰间再往前挪了挪,搂得她更近些.

sentences.en: His voice carried farther than mine.
sentences.cn: 他的声音比我的声音传得远.

sentences.en: I can throw the ball farther than you can.
sentences.cn: 这个球我能比你扔得远.

sentences.en: I can't see any farther than the next six months.
sentences.cn: 6个月以后的事情我就无法预见了。

sentences.en: If I climb up a tree, I can see farther.
sentences.cn: 如果我爬到树上的话，我就能看得更远一些了。

sentences.en: Most of them were locals, but some had come from farther afield (= a greater distance away ) .
sentences.cn: 他们大部分是当地人，但也有一些来自较远的地方。
我们去更远的地方好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She set her glass down and slid farther under the covers.
sentences.cn: 她放下杯子，钻进被子里。

sentences.en: Staff who have to travel farther can claim excess travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 需要到更远的地方出差的职员可以领取额外差旅费。

sentences.en: The farther hill is five kilometres away.
sentences.cn: 那座更远的小山在五公里以外.

sentences.en: We decided not to go any farther.
sentences.cn: 我们决定不再往前走了。

sentences.en: We went no farther than the bridge.
sentences.cn: 我们走到桥头就不再往前走了.

words.tran_cn: 进一步的；更远的（far的比较级）
更远地；此外；更进一步地

trans.tran_cn: （空间、方向或时间上）更/较远的
trans.tran_en: more distant; a  comparative  form of ‘far’

trans.tran_cn: （时间或空间上）更/较远地，更大程度上
trans.tran_en: a greater distance than before or than something else; a  comparative  form of ‘far’
